name: Trans Cambrian Way
description: Epic 3-day crossing of the Cambrian Mountains. Remote wilderness riding through the oldest mountain range in Europe.

description: 4-day Snowdonia traverse visiting all major trail centres. Wild terrain with serious climbing.

name: Sarn Helen (Wales Coast to Coast)
description: The ultimate Welsh MTB challenge. 430km from North to South Wales crossing every major mountain range.
